title: Computational Thinking (CT) Skill Development Program Through Text-Based Programming

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and foundational logical thinking skills
context.additional_context: Optimizing accessibility using VR simulations in smartphone-centric constrained technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can design and implement algorithms using text-based programming languages.
Learners apply computational thinking elements (decomposition, pattern recognition, abstraction, algorithmic thinking) to real-world problem-solving.
Through collaboration, learners experience the process of analyzing and correcting logical errors in programming projects.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
